repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Workers United Poster #6284 G. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6284: Workers United Records 6284 AV: Workers United Audiovisual Materials 6284 MB: Workers United Memorabilia 6284 P: Workers United Photographs 6284 PUBS: Workers United Publications 6284(d): Workers United Records (digital)

controlaccess.corpname: Hotel Employees & Restaurant Employees International Union
Union of Needletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 posters, one in English, one in multiple languages

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Poster: Immigrant Workers Freedom Ride, Rally & Festival, NYC, 2003; Health in Aging Month, 2000 (3 pcs.); Meet Janie-one of America's best dressed women to be; Study Period

did.unittitle: Poster: We Are All Workers: Remember the Triangle Fire-March 25, 2014--12-1 PM (2 copies)
